reqs:
Co-reqs: (THTR 471, THTR 472, THTR 473)
Equivalents: (THTR 473 and THTR 474 are equivalent to THTR 462)
This course is restricted to students enrolled in the final year of UBC's BFA Acting Program.
Stage Combat, Voice-over, British and American dialects.
description: Open only to B.F.A. Acting students.
